entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 23 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
